meet_me.title: Meet me
meet_me.subtitle: The designer behind the work
meet_me.bio: As someone passionate about technology and design, Create digital experiences that are meaningful to the people is a significant part of the journey. Through my graduate studies in the state university of Paraiba I aim to combine them with my practical knowledge as a UI&UX Developer in Knex Jr.

contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Let´s talk.
